data.title: Hugh Grant's Wife And Relationship History
data.meta_description: Hugh Grant, the charming British actor who has captured hearts around the world, has had his fair share of high-profile relationships. In this article, our ...
data.text:
Hugh Grant, the charming British actor who has captured hearts around the world, has had his fair share of high-profile relationships. In this article, our editors delved deep into his intriguing dating history, searching various entertainment news outlets and social media to bring you the most updated information on Hugh Grant's romantic endeavors. From long-term commitments to brief flings, we've compiled a comprehensive list of Hugh Grant's relationships, covering every whisper about his love life.

Currently settled down, Hugh Grant's wife and spouse, Anna Eberstein, is the apple of his eye. The couple got married in 2018, a few years after starting their relationship in 2012. Given Hugh's rollercoaster love life, it seems as if Anna was the one who managed to tame his heart. However, before he found lasting happiness with Anna, Hugh dated several stunning women. Some notable ex-girlfriends in his typically glamorous list include the iconic Elizabeth Hurley, whom he was with from 1987 until 2000, and socialite Jemima Khan, who was romantically linked to the actor from 2004 to 2007. These are just a few examples of the captivating women who make up Hugh Grant's girlfriend list.

This well-researched compilation is a treasure trove for fans eager to delve into Hugh Grant's dating history and answer the burning question: "Is Hugh Grant married?" Now that you've had a taste of his romantic escapades, we invite you to uncover more of his relationships by exploring our complete list. You won't want to miss any juicy detail about the heartthrob's fascinating love life.
